snippet: Daimler has given its chief, Dieter Zetsche, a three-year extension of his contract just a few days after the company reported record annual profits.
abstract: Daimler extends contract of chief executive officer Dieter Zetsche to 2019 following corporation's report of record annual profits.
lead_paragraph: Daimler has given its chief, Dieter Zetsche, a three-year extension of his contract just a few days after the company reported record annual profits.

headline.print_headline: Daimler Gives Its Chief 3-Year Contract Extension
headline.main: Daimler Gives Chief Executive a 3-Year Contract Extension
